KitKat::

She pulled her hand back from his. She stood up fast and snarled at 
him. "You sound like a maximal. Live by emotions. All they do is make 
you feel more pain than any battle wound. Seer your spark untill it 
is about to break. Make your logic circuits scramble and makes you 
make mistakes. Listen to me and heed my warning. Don't go there."
She turned to walk out of the mess hall.




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : SharpClaw : :
> SharpClaw looks at the stunning femme. He was right, something bad 
had happened in her past, and had cause her to cut off her emotions.
> 
> SharpClaw: You opened your spark up to someone and it ended badly, 
maybe tragicaly right? How about you tell me what happened exactly. 
It may do you good to talk about it. And let me tell you something. 
Living by our emotions isn't a mistake. Sure it may sometimes lead us 
into trouble, but it also can do good. It's the only way to truely 
live, to feel alive. Mistakes are ment to teach you lessons for the 
future.
> 
> SharpClaw's hand had moved to hers, taking hers in his.
> 
> OOC: Hmm since the restart, all the DrillBit/KitKat stuff didn't 
happen in this NBW. I'd really like to use that history and elaborate 
on it, but it really doesn't make any since...
>
